movies.title: Poids léger
movies.plot: A young man tries his way in boxing, supported by a coach. He meets a girl, falls in love and she becomes pregnant.
movies.simplePlot: A young man tries his way in boxing, supported by a coach. He meets a girl, falls in love and she becomes pregnant.

biography.bio: Touted as a rebel, Duvauchelle seem to be one of the most promising young actors in France and Europe. While studying to become a pharmacy employee, he was discovered in a boxing club in Paris. After some auditions, he starred in Le petit voleur (1999), and many other films such as Snowboarder (2003), an action movie, and Trouble Every Day (2001) with 'Beatrice Dalle'. Thanks to his handsome appearance, he became a male-model, and starred in a TV ad for Levi's jeans, and became Hugo Boss perfume's supermodel. Nicolas was brought to stardom by Les corps impatients (2003) with Laura Smet. He confirmed his status of rebel actor playing in Poids léger (2004), a movie where he played a boxer.
biography.name: Nicolas Duvauchelle

biography.bio: Bernard Campan was born on April 4, 1958 in Agen, Lot-et-Garonne, France. He is an actor and writer, known for Les trois frères (1995), Le pari (1997) and How Much Do You Love Me? (2005).
biography.name: Bernard Campan

biography.bio: Maï Anh Le was born in Paris, France. She is an actress, known for Two Brothers (2004), 3 Days to Kill (2014) and Samouraïs (2002).
biography.name: Maï Anh Le

biography.bio: Sophie Quinton was born on August 31, 1976 in Villedieu-les-Poêles, Manche, France. She is an actress, known for Qui a tué Bambi? (2003), La chatte andalouse (2002) and 38 témoins (2012).
biography.name: Sophie Quinton

biography.bio: Élisabeth Commelin is an actress, known for Chocolat (2000), La Vie en Rose (2007) and French Kiss (1995).
biography.name: Élisabeth Commelin

biography.bio: Frédéric Gorny was born on September 6, 1973 in Asnieres-sur-Seine, France. He is an actor, known for Avocats & associés (1998), Wild Reeds (1994) and Jeanne and the Perfect Guy (1998).
biography.name: Frédéric Gorny

biography.bio: Gilles Treton is an actor, known for Marie's Story (2014), Les cowboys (2015) and L'homme aux mille visages (2016).
biography.name: Gilles Treton

biography.bio: Stéphane Daimé is an actor, known for Poids léger (2004).
biography.name: Stéphane Daimé

biography.bio: Xavier Daimé is an actor, known for Poids léger (2004).
biography.name: Xavier Daimé

biography.bio: Louis Bellanti is an actor and writer, known for Betty Blue (1986), Persécution (2009) and Rosalie Blum (2015).
biography.name: Louis Bellanti

biography.bio: Hubert Benhamdine is an actor and director, known for Le chignon d'Olga (2002), Primrose Hill (2007) and I Dreamt Under the Water (2008).
biography.name: Hubert Benhamdine

biography.bio: Ugo Broussot began his training at the Regional Drama Conservatory of Orleans in the sight of Nicole Mérouze, Jean-Claude Cotillard and Niseema Theillaud. He obtained a Bachelor of Theatre Studies at the Faculty Théâtre de Paris III (Sorbonne Nouvelle). His acting career began in the theater, where he appeared in plays such as L'Enfant Chance, Allons Z'Enfants (J.-L. Levasseur), C'est Bien (Philippe Delerm), Y'a Quelqu'un! (Bernard Friot & V. Lesergent) or Alice in Wonderland, News Stories like that (R. Demarcy). In film, he plays under the direction of Frédéric Fonteyne (Brother and Sister), Jean-Marc Moutout (K. Memories), Laurence Ferreira Barbosa (Well now dance: sketch Escal'Amore), Maria Pinto (Un Sauvage Honnête Homme, Moi qui duperais le Bon Dieu), Cristi Puiu (The Mouse is under the table).
biography.name: Ugo Broussot

biography.bio: Yvette Caldas is an actress and director, known for Gagner la vie (2001), Lola Zipper (1991) and Un dimanche chez les Pinto (1996).
biography.name: Yvette Caldas

biography.bio: Nguyen Thi My Chau is known for her work on Tang le onzième (1998), Full Metal Jacket (1987) and Le bal des actrices (2009).
biography.name: Nguyen Thi My Chau

biography.bio: Marie Coulonjou is an actress, known for The Art of Love (2011), Amis publics (2016) and Poids léger (2004).
biography.name: Marie Coulonjou
